backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, workout and weight record types, calendar keys, and stores workout/weight data with access-controlled update functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence tying new workout progress chart and data hook features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend components, screens, and utilities used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring providers, onboarding flow, navigation, and screen rendering.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing app branding, user name, help button, theme toggle, and auth controls.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/AsyncState.tsx: Utility component displaying loading, error, empty, or content states.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating with Internet Identity and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar switching between four main app tabs.
frontend/src/components/CompletionToggle: Button for marking a workout complete for a given date with skip-state handling and auth gating.
frontend/src/components/DateSelector.tsx: Provides UI controls to navigate days and pick a date using buttons and a calendar popover.
frontend/src/components/DietEditDialog.t: Dialog for editing daily meal overrides with fields for meal details and actions to save or reset.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays an alert when an error occurs and offers a page reload option.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseCard.tsx: Displays exercise details and includes a rest timer with start, pause, and reset controls.
Dialog for setting or updating user fitness goals such as weight, frequency, and duration.
frontend/src/components/MealDayDetail.ts: Shows meal details for a day including type, nutrition info, and an illustration.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingTourDi: Introductory dialog explaining app sections with icons and options to dismiss or revisit later.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter a name and creates an initial profile.
frontend/src/components/ProteinScoopsTra: Card to track daily protein scoop intake with increment/decrement controls and status display.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuthNotic: Shows an alert prompting users to sign in if no identity is detected.
frontend/src/components/SafetyDisclaimer: Displays workout or diet safety guidance based on the provided type.
frontend/src/components/SkipDayToggle.ts: Provides a button to skip or unskip a workout or diet day, requiring user identity.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/WaterGlassesTrac: Tracks daily water intake with increment and decrement controls tied to backend state.
frontend/src/components/WaterReminderSet: Allows enabling and scheduling a daily water reminder, storing settings locally.
Renders buttons for selecting a weekday index from Monday to Sunday.
frontend/src/components/WeighInForm.tsx: Form dialog to add a new weight entry with async submission.
frontend/src/components/WeighInList.tsx: Displays recent weight entries with loading and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/WeightChart.tsx: Renders a lightweight SVG line chart for the last 10 weight entries.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutDayDetail: Shows details for a workout day, supporting skipped state and exercise sections.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutEditDialo: Dialog for editing a specific day's workout, allowing section and exercise management.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutProgressC: Generates a completion heatmap for a date range and summarizes completion stats.
frontend/src/data/mealPlan.ts: Defines a Meal interface and exports a multi-day meal plan array with nutritional details.
frontend/src/data/workoutPlan.ts: Defines workout-related interfaces and exports a structured multi-day intermediate workout plan.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryKeys.ts: Provides centralized React Query keys for user, workout, diet, water, and protein data.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Fetches the current user profile via an actor with React Query, handling loading and availability states.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDietSkip.t: Manages diet-skip status per date using localStorage with query and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProteinSco: Handles reading and updating protein scoop counts per date using local storage utilities.
Provides mutations for saving and updating user profile goals via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWaterGlass: Reads and updates daily water glass counts using local storage through React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWeightEntr: Fetches weight entries and latest weight, and adds new weight entries via actor mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWorkoutCom: Manages workout completion records, stats, and date-specific completion toggles through actor-based queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWorkoutFor: Provides hooks to fetch, save, and reset workouts for a date, handling custom overrides and default plan logic.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWorkoutSki: Hooks to get, toggle, and set whether a workout was skipped for a date, with related cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDietOverrides.ts: Manages diet plan overrides per date using localStorage, with hooks to fetch, save, and reset meals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context for Internet Identity, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntervalTimer.ts: Implements a countdown timer hook with start, pause, reset, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboardingTour.ts: Controls onboarding modal visibility using localStorage to persist dismissed state.
frontend/src/hooks/useWaterReminder.ts: Runs a periodic check to show water reminders via toast and notifications at a specified daily time.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind and custom CSS variables defining theme colors, dark mode, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/DietScreen.tsx: Renders the diet screen with date selection, skip toggling, water/protein trackers, meal details, and an edit dialog using diet-related hooks.
frontend/src/screens/HomeScreen.tsx: Displays user goals, workout stats, latest weight, and allows editing goals with authentication and async data loading.
frontend/src/screens/ProgressScreen.tsx: Shows workout and weight progress charts, a weigh‑in list, and a form to add entries, pulling data for a 30‑day range.
frontend/src/screens/WorkoutScreen.tsx: Displays workout details for a selected date with edit capability, authentication checks, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Provides date formatting, parsing, arithmetic, and weekday mapping utilities.
frontend/src/utils/trackerStorage.ts: Handles localStorage read/write for water glasses and protein scoops using per‑user/date keys with anonymous fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash‑based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugin extensions for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON project state describing app summary, architecture notes, issues, and feature requests related to workout progress tracking and charting.
